titleStmt.title: Some helpes for young schollers in Christianity as they are in vse & taught; partly, at the examination before the communion: and partly, in the ordinarie catechisme euery Sabboth day, in the new kirk of Salt-Preston..
titleStmt.author: Davidson, John, ca. 1549-1603.
Sibbald, Robert, Sir, 1641-1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert VValdegraue, Printer to the Kings Maiesty.,

notesStmt.note: Includes prayers and psalms (with music) at end.
Inscription (partly marked out) on leaf facing t.p.: Gifted by the much honoured Sir Robert Sibbald to Mr. Jameson [- defaced -] Octr 18 1702.
Imperfect: stained and mutilated, resulting in loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
